movies.overview: It's Saturday in the woods: strange noises draw the girl's attention. It's the Devil.
movies.title: Sábado no mato

movies.overview: A wealthy family gathers for a sumptuous dinner at their ostentatious home in the Welsh mountains, hosting a local businessman and farmer who hope to broker a business deal to mine in the surrounding countryside. When a mysterious young woman arrives to be their waitress for the evening, the family’s beliefs and values are challenged as her quiet yet disturbing presence begins to unravel their lives.
movies.title: The Feast

movies.overview: June, 1816. A French navy frigate ran aground on a sandbar off the coast of Senegal. Attempts to free the board were futile - the crew had no choice but to abandon ship. Since the available boats were not enough to accommodate the entire crew, the team built a raft. It accommodated 147 people: soldiers, sailors, several passengers and officers. The plan was for the boats to tow the raft. But the cable broke and the raft drifted into the open sea. For those who were on the raft, a harsh and cruel struggle for life began.
movies.title: The Belly of the Sea

movies.overview: Bunty and Babli are forced out of retirement after a spate of robberies with their trademark sigil start appearing across India but have to come back as a new pair of con emerges, doing robberies in their name.
movies.title: Bunty Aur Babli 2

movies.overview: The concluding film to the Gintama anime series, adapting the final chapters of the manga series of the same name written by Hideaki Sorachi. The film covers chapters 699-704 of the original manga, with original material added in.
movies.title: Gintama: The Very Final

movies.overview: Toichi is a boatman who ferries the villagers to a town on the other side of the river. Besides rowing a boat for the villagers all day long, he barely communicates with anyone except Genzo, a young neighbour. Upstream, a large bridge is being constructed. Everyone is excited, but Toichi has mixed feelings about it. One day, Toichi meets a mysterious girl. Having no family and no place to go, Toichi lets her stay with him, but this encounter starts to bring about changes to Toichi's life.
movies.title: They Say Nothing Stays the Same

movies.overview: A day in the life of two misfits as they surf, smoke and hunt sexual predators.
movies.title: Filthy Animals

movies.overview: Dettori is the exhilarating, tub-thumping celebration of inspirational jockey Frankie Dettori, the rock star of racing and one of the most decorated sportsmen of all time, named Longines World's Best Jockey for the last three years.
movies.title: Dettori

movies.overview: Told across a number of years, part of the ever waging war between the police and the criminal empires spanning Eastern Europe, we follow one young man's life, his childhood and adolescence and ultimately his descent into the criminal underworld. His path soon crosses with a policeman who will stop at nothing to catch him.
movies.title: Pitbull

movies.overview: Mitsuko Kuroda is 31-years-old and single. She enjoys her life as a single woman. A big reason why she enjoys her single life is that she has counsellor "A" in her mind, which is her other self. Whenever she does not know what do, "A" gives her the right answers. She believes her happy and peaceful single life with "A" will continue, but she falls in love with Tada-kun (Kento Hayashi). He is a salesperson and younger than her. --asianwiki
movies.title: Hold Me Back

movies.overview: Robert, a young actor living a life of lost relationships. A day on a film set, his obsessive roommate Basia follows him to make him see her breakdown. Quietly he watches as they're taking her away.
movies.title: Flashlights

movies.overview: Norwegian remake of the 1973 Czech film "Three Wishes for Cinderella" by Václav Vorlícek.
movies.title: Three Wishes for Cinderella

movies.overview: Follows Kevin Garnett's remarkable career and the progressive moments that defined it.
movies.title: Kevin Garnett: Anything is Possible

movies.overview: Maggie and Carsten love each other, they have two wonderful children and run their own gourmet restaurant; Malus. They want it all. And they have it all. Almost. They are missing the coveted Michelin Star. It has been their dream, on which they gambled everything to win. One day Carsten receives a letter saying that his wife loves somebody else. But who sent the letter and why? In their continuous passion and pursuit for the ultimate recognition, they forget that the meals of life are best enjoyed together.
movies.title: A Taste of Hunger

movies.overview: The Chillers are the people’s group. They came to smash glass, glass ceilings and walls. A world in which parity was conspicuous by its absence, 6 friends without any pretense decided to break the rule and jump onto a stage with minimal knowledge, but with desire to change the world.
movies.title: Revolution Dancing

movies.overview: At a spring party, a conflict between their children forces two sisters into an old rivalry. As distrust, jealousy and guilt take hold of Eva and Kristien, both their ugliest and most human traits are revealed.
movies.title: FLOCK

movies.overview: After her husband falls into a vegetative state, a woman does everything in her power to make ends meet - even if that means cutting chickens' heads or becoming a hit woman.
movies.title: Go to Kill
